name: MultiPlay
description: MultiPlay is a React-based web app featuring simple 2-player games, built with Tailwind CSS, Context API & Swiper.js. The project is actively maintained with new updates coming soon.

name: Audiophile Ecommerce Website
description: Audiophile is a responsive eCommerce site for premium audio gear, built with React, TypeScript, and useReducer.

name: Entertaining Web App
description: Entertaining Web App is a React app for browsing movies and TV shows, featuring search, filters, and a responsive UI.

name: Digital Corp
description: A modern team portfolio site built with React and TypeScript, showcasing team members, goals, and values with a clean, responsive design.

name: Ecommerce Product Page
description: A single product page built with React, featuring detailed product info and an add-to-cart functionality. Designed with a clean layout and smooth user interaction.

name: Lukoil Georgia Homepage Redesign
description: This is a redesigned and upgraded main page of Lukoil.ge georgian website. The redesign was completed with Tailwind.css and some libraries such as Swiper.js.

name: GitHub User Search
description: A React app that lets you search for GitHub users by username. Fetches and displays user data in real-time using the GitHub API.

name: Planets Fact Site
description: An informative React website about planets, featuring dynamic routing for each planet's detail page.
